Hi! I am trying to copy content from a page (let's say parent page) to a certain page ( childpage ). I copied the layoutSections data from the parent page and sent an update to the child page using HubSpot API v3 ( using CURL ). This is the API's response - <https://pastebin.com/S1FwxnFF>. Can someone please help? Thanks in advance
